reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress comfortable without a bra and appreciate its flattering body-con shape that accentuates curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress so far!
items.body: The dress is so very soft and comfortable and itâ€™s not see through at all, it fits really well but still hugs your curves without feeling suffocating! Itâ€™s a little longer than Iâ€™d normally prefer but itâ€™s not bad however, the dress does bunch up just a tiny bit when you move around for a while but itâ€™s not very noticeable.For reference Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and 140 pounds and I went with a smallðŸ˜Š Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and stretchy
items.body: So incredibly soft and comfortable and cute. Very fitted as the picture shows which is what I wanted but still stretchy enough to be able to get on. The fabric was surprisingly thick and heavy and double lined so I donâ€™t think there will be any issues with transparency (not see through). Very worth the money! Straps are thin so might be a bit tougher if you have a bigger bust and didnâ€™t want to wear a bra or any other support. Read more
items.author: Alora

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove
items.body: Wow! This dress is so comfortable and flattering. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner for a destination wedding I attended and it was the perfect outfit. Fabric gave some compression without being overwhelming or making me hot (humid weather) It was stretchy, it did not wrinkle in my luggage. it was a great value and fit amazing. I'm a DD and didnt feel the need to wear a bra. Read more
items.author: Marie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress.
items.body: Beautiful dress. Fits us shorties well under 5 3. Small fit great. Iâ€™m 100 lbs for reference. Only thing is itâ€™s a dust and pet hair magnet but if you have a sticky roller youâ€™re fine. Itâ€™s soft. It is great color like shown and has a slip underneath so not see through. Read more
items.author: Misstie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO COMFY AND FLATTERING!
items.body: SO COMFY AND FLATTERING! I am currently pregnant and it is so breathable and stretchy. Iâ€™ve had this dress since before I was pregnant and it still had a great fit! Itâ€™s good material and does not get ugly in the washer! Itâ€™s double lined so itâ€™s see through at all. I always get so many compliments in this dress! Read more
items.author: Gisselle Sanchez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for the price
items.body: Bought this dress to wear for my 49th birthday and it is so cute! For reference, I bought a small and Iâ€™m 5â€™4 120lbs. Very cute dress, soft material, and fitted. It can be very dressy or casual depending on heels and jewelry worn with it. Read more
items.author: jordyn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but the straps break
items.body: Very cute, very flattering, extremely comfortable, has lining so it is not at all see through, fits true to size. Iâ€™m 5ft 4in about 140lbs, ordered a medium, it reaches just past my ankles but is not tripping length. The reason for less stars is because I only wore it twice before I had to sew the straps because they broke. Iâ€™m good at sewing so I donâ€™t really mind that but if I was wearing it when the straps broke, weâ€™d have another story here. Read more
items.author: Alexis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: The perfect dress! Reminds me of the Skims dress. The length was great being 5â€™3. It wasnâ€™t too sheer with the double lining. It was breathable and fit my body shape well. Iâ€™ll be buying more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Jacy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Hotpink, Sagegreen, Black, Champagne, Dustyblue, Red, Emeraldgreen, Pink, White, Lime Green, Purple, Neon Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
